description: Triangle of (Gaussian) q-binomial coefficients for q=-14.
comments: May be read as a symmetric triangular (T[n,k]=T[n,n-k]; k=0,...,n; n=0,1,...) or square array (A[n,r]=A[r,n]=T[n+r,r], read by antidiagonals). - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 04 2012
links: Index entries related to Gaussian binomial coefficients.
prog: (PARI) T015132(n, k, q=-14)=prod(i=1, k, (q^(1+n-i)-1)/(q^i-1)) \\ (Indexing is that of the triangular array: 0 <= k <= n = 0,1,2,...) - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 04 2012
